name: Ripper
sq: cold resistance 15, displacement, DR 5/+2, fire resistance 15, resistance to ranged attacks, SR 20

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.desc: Any melee or ranged attack directed at Ripper has a 50% miss chance unless the attacker can locate the beast by some means other than sight. A true seeing effect allows the user to see the beastâ€™s position, but see invisibility has no effect.

Resistance to Ranged Attacks.name: Resistance to Ranged Attacks
Resistance to Ranged Attacks.desc: A displacer beast gains a +2 resistance bonus on saves against any ranged spell or ranged magical attack that specifically targets it, except for ranged touch attacks.

Smite Good.name: Smite Good
Smite Good.desc: Once per day, Ripper gains a +10 bonus on a single damage roll against a good foe.
